Megan Barton Hanson proved she is feeling confident and sexy in the wake of her latest break up.

She got pulses racing with her latest Instagram upload on Sunday.

The Love Island star, 25, slipped her surgically-enhanced curves into a semi-sheer black lace catsuit that left very little to the imagination.

Oozing sex appeal, the former stripper stared seductively down the camera lens as she rose her arms in the air for the sizzling upload that was taken in a doorway.

Ensuring her snap was not taken down from the social media site, the brunette covered her bust with her long dark tresses.

Megan enhanced her plump pout with a slick of pillar-box red lipstick and gave her face a dusting of bronzer.

(Image: Instagram)

She captioned the offering:"The baddest P**Y in the room @annsummers #halloweencollection #highjinksorkinks."

It comes after Megan has reportedly split from her girlfriend Chelcee Grimes, and has been making subtle digs about the breakup on social media.

The former exotic dancer and her singer ex, 27, couldn't make time to see each other, it's claimed.

But Megan took to her Instagram stories to suggest that the end of their relationship wasn't as amicable as it first appeared.

She shared a quote that said: "Reminder: Relationships are supposed to make you feel good."

(Image: Getty Images)

Hours after Megan made the cryptic post, Chelcee shared a quote on her own Instagram that hinted about her side of the split.

She shared lines from a poem called Irrelevant Now by author Arch Hades, with the lyrics reading: "Instead of standing by my side You tricked me into conceding.

"Into dimming my own light, Feeling guilty got succeeding."

Megan and Chelcee are said to be on good terms after calling it a day.

A source told The Sun: "They got on really well and enjoyed a brief romance, but decided to call it a day earlier this week.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Chelcee Grimes/Instagram)

"Both were a bit upset about it, but remain pals.

"Chelcee is throwing herself into her music projects and concentrating on recording new tracks at the moment.

"She is working on a music video so that is taking her mind off her love life."
description: The Love Island bombshell showed her ex what she is missing with her latest raunchy post
